sentences.english: Thi provide the hip with an effective protection againt torpedoe attack.
sentences.chinese: 这对舰船抵御鱼雷攻击提供了有效保护。

sentences.english: Acoustic correlation velocity measurement technology is used to make measurements of velocity relative to the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 声相关测速技术可以测得舰船相对于海底的绝对速度。

sentences.english: To launch a torpedo the ship has to be within firing range (in the game, this is approximately 1km).
sentences.chinese: 舰船要发射一杖鱼雷必须在射程范围内。

sentences.english: Anti-shock behavior of equipments on board the naval ship is a critical characteristic of the survivability.
sentences.chinese: 舰船设备抗冲击性能是舰船生命力设计的重要内容。

sentences.english: Anti-shock behavior of equipments on board the naval ship is a critical characteristic of the survivability.
sentences.chinese: 舰船设备抗冲击性能是舰船生命力设计的重要内容。

sentences.english: A warship involved in a battle would encounter the assault from enemy anti-warship weapons.
sentences.chinese: 舰船在海战时，会遭到敌方反舰武器的攻击。

sentences.english: Some overseer structures that are supposed to drop loot will now do so.
sentences.chinese: 一些监察官舰船已正确掉落战利品。

sentences.english: Beijing denounced the Japanese vessel for shadowing exercises by some of its own warships.
sentences.chinese: 北京则谴责日本舰船隐瞒其军舰的军事演习。

sentences.english: The integrated communication system is the nervous centralis of naval vessels.
sentences.chinese: 综合通信系统是舰船的“中枢神经”。

sentences.english: Short-wave communication is the main means of the remote communication between ships on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 短波通信是目前海上舰船实施远程通信的重要手段。

sentences.english: In this article, we have a deep study on the airborne ISAR imaging of ship targets.
sentences.chinese: 本文对机载ISAR舰船成像作了较深入的研究。

sentences.english: The corresponding modified back-propagation (MB-P)algorithm is proposed and applied to marine radar target identification system.
sentences.chinese: 将这两种算法分别应用于舰船雷达目标识别系统。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the safety of ship personnel by non-contact underwater explosion attack.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估水下非接触爆炸对舰船人员的冲击安全性。

sentences.english: The result of the research is expected to be used in the optimal design of the naval floating raft.
sentences.chinese: 研究成果可为舰船浮筏系统的优化设计提供参考。

sentences.english: More than 1, 900 vessels are in the Gulf assisting in the clean up.
sentences.chinese: 超过1900艘各类舰船在该海域协助清理泄漏石油。
